subject: Basketball
NBA Championship
lead_paragraph: The Warriors slipped past LeBron James, who scored a game-high 44 points, and the Cleveland Cavaliers to take Game 1 of the N.B.A. finals.
snippet: The Warriors slipped past LeBron James, who scored a game-high 44 points, and the Cleveland Cavaliers to take Game 1 of the N.B.A. finals.
